title: Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Installation

body.body: Front ABS Wheel Speed Sensor - Installation
Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Position the wheel speed sensor and shim to the fork leg, routing the harness as noted during removal. Fit the fixing and tighten to
Secure the wheel speed sensor harness to the brake hose clips.
Route the harness as noted for removal and connect the wheel speed sensor electrical connector to the main harness.
The air gap between the wheel speed sensor and the pulser ring must be between 0.4 mm and 1.2 mm. Check, and if necessary, adjust the air gap (see
